::: {.callout-note title="WzÃ³r na pracÄ™ technicznÄ… przemiany politropowej"}
$$ l_t = \frac{n}{n-1} R T_1 \left[ \left(\frac{p_2}{p_1}\right)^{\frac{n-1}{n}} - 1 \right] $$
:::

### Obliczenia:
*   $R = 287 \text{ J}/(\text{kg K})$
*   $T_1 = 293.15 \text{ K}$
*   $p_2/p_1 = 9.5$
*   $n = 1.35$

::: {.fragment}
$$ l_t = \frac{1.35}{0.35} \cdot 287 \cdot 293.15 \cdot \left[ (9.5)^{\frac{0.35}{1.35}} - 1 \right] $$
$$ l_t = 3.857 \cdot 84134 \cdot [ 1.795 - 1 ] $$
$$ l_t \approx 324\,400 \cdot 0.795 \approx \mathbf{258\,000 \text{ J/kg} = 258 \text{ kJ/kg}} $$
:::
